verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> another <S%G243><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> marvelous <S%G2298><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the sky: <S%G3772><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> plagues, <S%G4127><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s wrath <S%G2372><s%> is finished. <S%G5055><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> something like <S%G5613><s%> a sea <S%G2281><s%> of glass <S%G5193><s%> mixed <S%G3396><s%> with fire, <S%G4442><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those who overcame <S%G3528><s%> <S%G1537><s%> the beast, <S%G2342><s%> <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> image, <S%G1504><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1537><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of glass, <S%G5193><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> harps <S%G2788><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They sang <S%G103><s%> the song <S%G5603><s%> of Moses, <S%G3475><s%> the servant <S%G1401><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the song <S%G5603><s%> of the Lamb, <S%G721><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Great <S%G3173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> marvelous <S%G2298><s%> are your <S%G4675><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the Almighty! <S%G3841><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> true <S%G228><s%> are your <S%G4675><s%> ways, <S%G3598><s%> you King <S%G935><s%> of the nations. <S%G40><s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> <S%G5399><s%> wouldn't <S%G3364><s%> fear <S%G5399><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> name? <S%G3686><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> you only <S%G3441><s%> are holy. <S%G3741><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> will come <S%G2240><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> you. <S%G4675><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> righteous acts <S%G1345><s%> have been revealed. <S%G5319><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> I looked, <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> of the tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> of the testimony <S%G3142><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> was opened. <S%G455><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> who had <S%G2192><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> plagues <S%G4127><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out, <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3485><s%> clothed <S%G1746><s%> with pure, <S%G2513><s%> <S%G2532><s%> bright <S%G2986><s%> linen, <S%G3043><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wearing golden <S%G5552><s%> sashes <S%G2223><s%> around <S%G4024><s%> their <S%G4012><s%> breasts. <S%G4738><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> living creatures <S%G2226><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> to the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> bowls <S%G5357><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> who lives <S%G2198><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The temple <S%G3485><s%> was filled <S%G1072><s%> with smoke <S%G2586><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> power. <S%G1411><s%> <S%G2532><s%> No one <S%G3762><s%> was able <S%G1410><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple, <S%G3485><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> plagues <S%G4127><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> would be finished. <S%G5055><s%>
